member.name: T:Microsoft.AppCenter.Distribute.Distribute
member.summary: Distribute feature.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Distribute.Distribute.OpenUrl(Foundation.NSUrl)
member.summary: Process URL request for the Distribute service. Place this method call into app delegate openUrl method.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Distribute.Distribute.DontCheckForUpdatesInDebug
member.summary: Do not check for updates in case the app is launched with a debug configuration. In case you want to use in-app updated, place this method call into your app delegate's FinishedLaunching method BEFORE you call AppCenter.Start(...) or before you init the forms application object if you use Xamarin Forms.
member.remarks: This method is required because the SDK cannot detect an attached debugger, nor can it detect a release configuration at runtime. If this method is not called, the browser will appear and try to setup in-app updates.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Distribute.Distribute.IsEnabledAsync
member.summary: Check whether the Distribute service is enabled or not.
member.returns: A task with result being true if enabled, false if disabled.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Distribute.Distribute.SetEnabledAsync(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Enable or disable the Distribute service.
member.returns: A task to monitor the operation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Distribute.Distribute.SetInstallUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Change the base URL opened in the browser to get update token from user login information.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Distribute.Distribute.SetApiUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Change the base URL used to make API calls.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AppCenter.Distribute.Distribute.ReleaseAvailable
member.summary: Sets the release available callback.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AppCenter.Distribute.Distribute.NotifyUpdateAction(Microsoft.AppCenter.Distribute.UpdateAction)
member.summary: If update dialog is customized by returning true in , You need to tell the distribute SDK using this function what is the user action.
member.param: Update action. On mandatory update, you can only pass

member.summary: Sets the update track (public vs private).

member.summary: Check for the latest release using the selected update track.

member.summary: Disable automatic check for update before the service starts.
